item.title: 50: Akh Afah Amphitheatre [Extreme]
item.description: Link to detailed guide for trial While you’re in there, try and find one of the only snowmen made out of 3 balls of snow intead of 2! Special Loot Diamond Dust, Shiva Card The Fight! There is a lot of circles to dodge, so pay attention to the circles on the ground and always look for a safe spot. Phase One: Weapon Abilities Staff Form Staff Form: Attacks put debuff on whoever is hit that decreases resistence to slashing.
